verses.name: Luke 19:10
verses.text: For the Son of man is come to seek and to save that which was lost.

verses.name: Luke 19:11
verses.text: And as they heard these things, he added and spake a parable, because he was nigh to Jerusalem, and because they thought that the kingdom of God should immediately appear.

verses.name: Luke 19:12
verses.text: He said therefore, A certain nobleman went into a far country to receive for himself a kingdom, and to return.

verses.name: Luke 19:13
verses.text: And he called his ten servants, and delivered them ten pounds, and said unto them, Occupy till I come.
